              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                     LogInFailureException,
                     ShutDownException

        Specified by:
        login in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        custName - - the user name of the customer that wants to log in.
        password - - the password of the customer that wants to log in.
        Returns:
        login - boolean weather the credentials are correct or not.

        java.sql.SQLException - - When database access error or other errors occur.
